name: Dawn's Bloom
desc4: Increases <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> DMG by 20%. When equipped by an Attack character, using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> will further increase <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> DMG by 20% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
